DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.ar_receipt_header a left join xbs.option_line o on a.receipt_type=o.option_line_id left join xbs.ar_customer a0 on a.ar_customer_id=a0.ar_customer_id left join xbs.ar_customer_site a1 on a.ar_customer_site_id=a1.ar_customer_site_id left join xbs.currency c on a.currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.currency c0 on a.doc_currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.mdm_bank_account_vx m on a.from_bank_account_id=m.mdm_bank_account_id left join xbs.mdm_bank_account_vx ba JOIN (SELECT org_id FROM org WHERE org_id='%{orgid}' OR parent_org_id='%{orgid}') ref ON ba.reftbltp='org' AND ba.refid=ref.org_id m0 on a.to_bank_account_id=m0.mdm_bank_account_id left join xbs.gl_ledger g on a.ledger_id=g.gl_ledger_id left join xbs.gl_period g0 on a.period_id=g0.gl_period_id left join xbs.option_line o0 on a.approval_status=o0.option_line_id left join xbs.option_line o1 on a.receipt_status=o1.option_line_id
DbDetails.Data: a.receipt_number,o.option_line_value receipt_type,a.reference_key_value,a0.customer_name ar_customer_id,a1.customer_site_name ar_customer_site_id,a.header_amount,c.title currency,c0.title doc_currency,a.description,a.created_by,a.creation_date,a.last_update_by,a.last_update_date,a.document_date,a.document_number,m.account_number from_bank_account_id,m0.account_number to_bank_account_id,g.ledger ledger_id,g0.period_name period_id,a.reference_type,a.reference_key_name,o0.option_line_value approval_status,o1.option_line_value receipt_status,a.ar_receipt_header_id
